title: My favorite PC speakers are back to their Prime Day price, just $84
description:
If you’ve spent any time on a desktop “battlestation” forum, you know the Edifier R1280T, by sight if not by name. It’s the go-to pick for high-quality bookshelf speakers on a budget, a mainstay of excessive desk setups across the internet and the real world. Including my excessive desk setup, where these bad boys have been a mainstay for over five years. A good deal at the standard price of $120, the R1280T set is just $84 today, which matches the low price for Amazon Prime Day this summer.

The R1280T is fairly old-fashioned as speakers go, with a 2.0 setup, two RCA inputs, some basic controls on the right, and an IR remote. But with four-in

title: MSI says motherboards supporting 256GB RAM are coming soon
description:
You can never have too much memory, in the same sense that you can never have too much toilet paper. If this philosophy appeals to you, you might want to check out the latest news from manufacturer MSI. The company announced that it’s enabling support for up to 256GB of DDR5 RAM on at least some of its consumer-grade motherboards, assuming the hardware can handle it and has the standard four memory module slots. If you don’t have a pocket calculator handy, that means a whopping 64GB on each individual DIMM. 2-slot boards will go up to 128GB.

description:

title: Upgrade to Microsoft Office Pro 2021 for life for just $50
description: Everybody knows Microsoft Office. The leading office suite has been in the driver’s seat for the last few decades for good reason, despite being a more expensive option. However, you can get Microsoft Office for Windows or Mac for a very special price this holiday season.
